согнуть; согнутый; изгиб; поворот (в дороге и т. д.); Классификаторы: 道
rtega_mnemonic:
彎彎RS
弯弯		bend, curve
  • bow 弓 with entwined strings /䜌: completely bent
  • wet man 亦 with bow 弓: assassin coming from hiding in the water with bent bow ready to shoot
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 弯)
Synonym: 曲
Antonyms: 直
Pictophonetic: 䜌 indicates the sound; 弓 (bow) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
彎腰 [ wān yāo ]: to stoop
彎曲 [ wān qū ]: to bend; to curve around; curved; crooked; to wind; to warp
彎路 [ wān lù ]: winding road; roundabout route; detour; (fig.) wrong way (of doing sth)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 䜌 [ luán ] chaos, distraction; to manage, to tie together
    • 弓 [ gōng ] bow; curved, arched
heisig_chinese_memo: The champion archer can use his bow to shoot an arrow with a curved trajectory which is so accurate he can scrape a needlepoint kilometers away.
Ru_trainchinese: wān: (глаг/прил/сущ) гнуть, сгибать; изогнутый, извилистый; изгиб, поворот
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the confused (䜌) bow (弓) curves
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Curve (curved) the bow just right as you pull back the string to hit the apple dead center and knock it out of the tree.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " bow " and "䜌", the original meaning is to draw a bow. "Shuowen": "Hold the bow to pass the arrow. From the bow, the sound is not." "Selected Works‧Sima Xiangru <Shanglin Fu>": "Bend the fan weak, full of white feathers." Guo Pu's commentary quoted Ying said: "Bend , Qianye; Fanwei, Xiahou clan's good bow."

" Bend " often means to bend and bend. Tang Dingze, "Shangyuan Day Dream Queen Mother Presents a White Jade Ring": "It seems to see the frosty whiteness, like looking at the moon color bend." Yuan Ma Zhiyuan's "Han Gong Qiu" second fold: "The one who locked the tree in the wall was afraid of bending his hands, The one who climbs the fence in the wall is afraid of breaking his head."

" Bend " also refers to the docking of ships and mooring in the water bay. "The Scholars" Chapter 43: "The uncle ordered to close the hole and bend the boat."

" Bend " is also used as a quantifier for curved objects. "A Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 21: "A peach red quilt covering only the chest, against the snow-white arm, wrapped around the quilt, and two gold bracelets are visible on it."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " bow " and "䜌", the original meaning is to draw a bow.
humanum_full_description:
從「弓」，「䜌」聲，本義為拉弓。《說文》：「持弓關矢也。从弓，䜌聲。」 《文選‧司馬相如〈上林賦〉》：「彎蕃弱，滿白羽。」郭璞注引文穎曰：「彎，牽也；蕃弱，夏后氏良弓之名。」

　　「彎」常表示彎曲及使彎曲。唐丁澤〈上元日夢王母獻白玉環〉：「似見霜姿白，如看月彩彎。」元馬致遠《漢宮秋》第二摺：「那壁廂鎖樹的怕彎着手，這壁廂攀欄的怕顛破了頭。」

　　「彎」也指指停船靠岸，泊於水灣。《儒林外史》第43回：「大爺吩咐急急收了口子，彎了船。」

　　「彎」也用作量詞，用於彎狀物。《紅樓夢》第21回：「一幅桃紅紬被，只齊胸蓋着，襯着那一彎雪白的膀子，撂在被外，上面明顯着兩個金鐲子。」

Chinese: The champion archer can use his bow to shoot an arrow with a curved trajectory which is so accurate he can scrape a needlepoint kilometers away.
Meaning: curved
Hanzi: 弯
Story: Curve (curved) the bow just right as you pull back the string to hit the apple dead center and knock it out of the tree.

從「 弓 」，「 䜌 」聲，本義為拉弓。《說文》：「持弓關矢也。从弓，䜌聲。」 《文選‧司馬相如〈上林賦〉》：「彎蕃弱，滿白羽。」郭璞注引文穎曰：「彎，牽也；蕃弱，夏后氏良弓之名。」 「 彎 」常表示彎曲及使彎曲。唐丁澤〈上元日夢王母獻白玉環〉：「似見霜姿白，如看月彩彎。」元馬致遠《漢宮秋》第二摺：「那壁廂鎖樹的怕彎着手，這壁廂攀欄的怕顛破了頭。」 「 彎 」也指指停船靠岸，泊於水灣。《儒林外史》第43回：「大爺吩咐急急收了口子，彎了船。」 「 彎 」也用作量詞，用於彎狀物。《紅樓夢》第21回：「一幅桃紅紬被，只齊胸蓋着，襯着那一彎雪白的膀子，撂在被外，上面明顯着兩個金鐲子。」
From the sound of " bow" and " 䜌", the original meaning is to draw a bow. "Shuowen": "Hold the bow to pass the arrow. From the bow, the sound is not." "Selected Works‧Sima Xiangru": "Bend the fan weak, full of white feathers." Guo Pu's commentary quoted Ying said: "Bend , Qianye; Fanwei, Xiahou clan's good bow." " Bend" often means to bend and bend. Tang Dingze, "Shangyuan Day Dream Queen Mother Presents a White Jade Ring": "It seems to see the frosty whiteness, like looking at the moon color bend." Yuan Ma Zhiyuan's "Han Gong Qiu" second fold: "The one who locked the tree in the wall was afraid of bending his hands, The one who climbs the fence in the wall is afraid of breaking his head." " Bend" also refers to the docking of ships and mooring in the water bay. "The Scholars" Chapter 43: "The uncle ordered to close the hole and bend the boat." " Bend" is also used as a quantifier for curved objects. "A Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 21: "A peach red quilt covering only the chest, against the snow-white arm, wrapped around the quilt, and two gold bracelets are visible on it."

彎字的基本解释

彎
wān
见“弯”。

彎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wān］
［《廣韻》烏關切，平删，影。］
“毌2”的被通假字。“弯1”的繁体字。“貫3”的被通假字。“關2”的被通假字。
(1)拉弓。
(2)弯曲。
(3)指弯子。
(4)折；使弯曲。
(5)同“灣”。水流弯曲之处。
(6)指停船靠岸，泊于水湾。
(7)鬻棺者的俗称。
(8)量词。用于弯状物。

彎字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【弓字部】　彎； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页361第28
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】烏關切【正韻】烏還切，?音灣。【說文】持弓關矢也。【玉篇】引也。【王褒·聖主得賢臣頌】逢門子彎烏號。　又【集韻】通作關。【孟子】越人關弓而射之。　又【韻會】通作貫。【史記·秦始皇本紀贊】士不敢貫弓而報怨。

彎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
彎字的起名意思

暂无。

bend
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wān］
["Guangyun" Wu caring, flat deletion, shadow. ]
"Wu 2" was passed falsely. "Bend 1" in traditional characters. "Guan 3" was passed falsely. "Guan 2" was passed falsely.
(1) Draw the bow.
(2) Bending.
(3) Refers to the bend.
(4) Fold; make a bend.
(5) Same as "Bay". Where the flow of water bends.
(6) Refers to the ship docking and mooring in the water bay.
(7) The common name of the coffin man.
(8) Quantifiers. Used for curved objects.
bend
